title: Intro to Astronomy
description: Fundamental terms about space and the universe

concepts.definition: A massive, luminous sphere of plasma held together by gravity

variations.text: The Sun is the closest star to Earth

concepts.definition: A celestial body orbiting a star, massive enough for gravity to make it round

variations.text: Earth is the third planet from the Sun

concepts.definition: A huge system of stars, gas, and dust bound together by gravity

variations.text: The Milky Way is our home galaxy
